name: Solar System (itch) (Anthrophobic)
description:
You can left click any planet to fixate the camera on it. To get back to the default camera position you can simply click the sun or right click once to return to default positioning.

I added the following to the project;

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Mars
  4. Jupiter
  5. Saturn
  6. Uranus
  7. Neptune
  8. Added sounds to Mercury, Saturn, and Neptune
  9. Adjusted both the main camera and the mini-map camera for better visibility
